mapper.select: SELECT t.* FROM yiyn_distributors t order by CREATED_TIME desc
mapper.update: update yiyn_distributors"src/main/resources/mybatis/center/DistributorsMapper.xml" set UPDATED_TIME = now(), dis_code = #{dis_code}, dis_name = #{dis_name}, link_url = #{link_url}, wechat_url = #{wechat_url} where id = #{id}
